description:
The Kakyo Festival Mister & Miss Super Contest is held every year at the Kakyoin Academy cultural festival. In order to defend the crown Kazuki took back the previous year, the students of Edel Rose dress up each in their own way in order to participate. While everyone is preparing for the contest, Leo`s sisters suddenly arrive with a certain proposition...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saionji Leo: Flowers Blooming in Your Heart
Saionji Leo: Kokoro no Hana o Sakasemashou
西園寺レオ 心の花を咲かせましょう♡
